body:
Comment 9 by **ikrabbe.ask**: 
I would send in a patch if there where not too much issues using codereview the first
time (for example I set up the release branch, but to codereview you have to be on the
default branch). I'm not in love with mercurial anyway.

But I attached a proposed note patch (against the release branch) below.
Attachments: 1. proposed-note.patch (1146 bytes)
